titles.title: Commending the Los Angeles Sparks basketball team for winning the 2002 Women's National Basketball Association championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Mr. Armey asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/10/2002--Passed House without amendment. Congratulates the Los Angeles Sparks for winning the 2002 Women's National Basketball Association (WNBA) championship, and all of the 16 teams that compose the WNBA for their hard work, dedication, and sportsmanship throughout the WNBA season.Recognizes the achievements of all the players, coaches, support staff, and fans who were instrumental in helping the Sparks win the championship.
